  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColumnIsFull
    Exception thrown when a player wants to add a tile to his bookshelf but the chosen column doesn't have enough space left.
    LobbyNotExists
    Exception thrown when a lobby does not exist.
    MoveNotPossible
    Umbrella Exception to contain all others.
    NotCurrentPlayer
    Exception thrown when a player tries to make a move when it is not his turn.
    OutOfDomain
    Exception thrown when a chosen point is outside the domain.
    SameElement
    Exception thrown when a player chooses more than one tile.
    TilesCannotBeSelected
    Exception thrown when a tile cannot be selected.
    TilesNotAdjacent
    Exception thrown picked tiles are not adjacent to each other.
    TooManySelected
    Exception thrown when a user selected too many tiles.
    UsernameAlreadyTaken
    Exception thrown when a username is already taken.
